description: Verrocchio is the boss of a branch of the Italian mafia based in Thailand. He once attempted to use the child assassins, Hänsel and Gretel, to kill the rival gang leaders, including Balalaika and Mr. Chang, in an attempt to seize complete leadership of Roanapur`s criminal underworld. Verrocchio was killed when Hänsel and Gretel turned against him on a murderous whim.
name: Verrocchio
